metadata.title: My Favorite Daughter Gave Me This Shirt Dad Premium T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 58% Cotton, 42% Polyester

This funny My Favorite Child Daughter Gave Me This Shirt is the perfect gift for Dad on Fathers Day. For all the awesome dads who love to joke around with their daughters about who the favorite child is. Also for a stepdad from stepdaughter

Funny shirt for dad. Cute dad gift from daughter or granddaughter. Also great as a gag gift for your parents or grandparents, Dads birthday, Grandpas birthday, Grandmas birthday, Moms birthday and Mothers Day. Click our brand name for more design options.
This premium t-shirt is made of lightweight fine jersey fabric
Fit: Men’s fit runs small, size up for a looser fit. Women’s fit is true to size, order usual size.
